name: Yellow Duckies
description: A reward token of the Yellow Network community, the main currency on the Duckies Platform. $DUCKIES is the currency on the Duckies Platformâ€”a token & NFT-based ecosystem created as a reward system for the community of Yellow Network. The platform revolves around social activity tasks, and a referral system; apart from that, users can use $DUCKIES to buy rare NFTs and do swaps for $YELLOW after its launch.
